name: Lucle
overview: L.U.C.L.E is an intergalactic space shuttle in search of alien life form. It's latest task is to explore the newly discovered planet "Hexlexon" 4.3 billion miles from the sun. On entering its atmosphere LUCLE is drained of most of its vital power. With time running out fast, LUCLE must travel over hazardous mountain ranges across deep caverns and icy lakes dotted with bombs, pit holes and take blocks to reach this vital energy source-Hexlexon centre of power "The Solar Energising Zones". The Race is On ...... challenge the clock through a labyrinth of 30 Action Packed Brain Teasing Levels.
